subject: Re: URGENT Website
preview: Just gonna close this andy sent an email

full_threads.body: Just gonna close this andy sent an email

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Urgent Tickets** workflow

full_threads.body: @joel please check this as this is urgent request/task from the customer. Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Tier 2** workflow

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy,

I hope you're well

We've received a phone enquiry from a parent who has submitted the online
enquiry form twice but hasn’t received a response. I’ve checked the email
inbox linked to the webform (*enrol@littlescribblers.com.au*) and couldn’t
find any record of either submission.

Could you please urgently investigate this possible disconnection? If you
need any further details, feel free to reach out to me at *0475 738 243*.

Appreciate your help!

Best,
Madeleine Saville






*Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator Little Scribblers Early
Learning CentresHEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence106 Russell AvenueDolls
Point NSW 2219*

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: *www.littlescribblers.com.au <http://www.littlescribblers.com.au>*




On Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 10:02 AM Heath Maguire <heath.maguire@wolfiq.com.au>
wrote:

Good Morning Jackie,

I just tried to call you to run through the below - thank you for your
patience.

*1. Form updates - done :)*

Firstly, let me say that the new form is up and running. If you click the
enquire buttons throughout the site, you will see the shortened form. We
have kept the old layout there, just hidden from the public for now. Can
you please confirm that we are sending the form submissions to the correct
email addresses? It's currently set up like this:

*enrol@littlescribblers.com.au <enrol@littlescribblers.com.au>:*

- Ashfield
- Belmore - Cleary Avenue
- Belmore - Benaroon Road
- Beaconsfield
- Brookvale
- Caringbah
- Dingley
- Mooroolbark, Birchwood Drive

*bondsroadsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au
<bondsroadsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au>*

- Peakhurst - Bonds Road

*peakhurstsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au
<peakhurstsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au>*

- Peakhurst - Belmore Road

*sutherlandsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au
<sutherlandsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au>*

- Sutherland

*2. Account Management:*

I mentioned to Madeleine yesterday about our New Director, Andy Crebar,
cc'd in. I can't recall if I mentioned this to you. I was quite focused on
the issue at hand, so it may have escaped me.

Some background context, ahead of our official communications due to be
sent out in the coming days/week(s). Andy has joined Wolf IQ as our new
Director, or 'Leader of the Pack' as the team has coined him. Andy will be
heading up all of our client-facing communications with the team. I will be
taking on a more behind the scenes roll. Andy has an incredible amount of
experience and will be growing our service offering and team accordingly.

All of my emails and phone calls are now being directed to Andy so that he
can take action or forward on the requests. Needless to say, it appears
that this has resulted in a delay for Little Scribblers. So please accept
mine and Andy's apology. The changes at our side of things are vast as we
wade through a decade of client account management from my end. But, of
course, this should not affect our clients.

Moving forward, you can send all requests to Andy and cc me in. Andy is
also manning my old mobile number and our main line: 1300 072 134. However,
if you are ever stuck and can't reach Andy, my personal mobile number is *0466
832 740. *I'll be able to jump in and help for urgent needs. Just don't
share my number around please haha.

I'm standing by if any updates are required on the new form. Please call
me or SMS as I won't be at my computer.

Again, thanks for your understanding.

Heath


On Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 9:11 AM Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

>

> Heath,
>
> We’re a little disappointed as we had a great conversation on Friday
> morning, and have t heard back from you.
>
> The changes were emailed to you within 30min, and you promised these
> would be done.
>
> We are now into Saturday and the changes haven’t been done nor have we
> been able to contact you or anyone else from your organisation.
>
> It was so important that this was done before cob yesterday.
>
>
> Jackie
> Kind Regards,

>
> I really really need you to spend some time going through our website
> with a fine tooth and comb.
>
> I need to know it is doing what it needs to, unfortunately looking at our
> data we seem to have less and less enquiries.
>
> We have 8+ locations and we sometimes have almost 0 enquiries.
>
> Our business is going backwards and we need something to change
> significantly, and I really believe something is definitely not right.
>
> Today I tested it and “book a tour” doesn’t work.
>
> Heath I can’t begin to tell you how critical the situation is and how
> important it is that you make sure it is set up correctly and working at it
> optimal.
>
> SEO is definitely not something to look at now
